item.title: Berkshire Hathaway's profits rise 17% as Buffett prepares to step down
item.description: Profits improved thanks to a mild hurricane season and more paper investment.

item.title: Black vultures attack and kill cattle. Climate change is one reason they're spreading
item.description: Black vultures have killed and eaten several calves on Tom Karrâ€™s cattle ranch in southeastern Ohio, a loss he says didn't happen two decades ago

item.title: Pfizer sues to stop rival bid for drugmaker Metsera by Denmark's Novo Nordisk
item.description: Pfizer is suing over some unsolicited competition in its nearly $5 billion bid to buy the drugmaker Metsera

item.title: Super greens powder supplements sold at Sam's Club linked to salmonella outbreak
item.description: Authorities say at least 11 people have been sickened with salmonella infections linked to powder supplements sold at Sam's Club stores nationwide and...

item.title: Turkish court sentences hotel owner and 10 others to life for deadly fire that killed 78
item.description: A Turkish court has sentenced the owner of a ski resort hotel and 10 others to life in prison for severe negligence in a deadly fire
